long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension allows users the following actions: Sign-up/sign-in to WealthPipe.com, rating of internet content via a slider, passing of rated content to WealthPipe, commenting on content and viewing of Trust Scores while browsing.
